post.title: re: dslr advice
post.content: hi i'm new here... and i hav a question is mamiya m645 reversing ring for auto bellows n with 58mm filter thread compatible with a canon eos digital rebel? i'm not sure and i realy want this. thanx in advance edit: thanx to whichever mod created this thread for me altho u put "rebel xt" and i hav a digital rebel...the one b4 it ..thanx much
